law.catch_line: The City of Cumberland shall submit to the Authority for review and approval any plan for any activi...
law.text:
The City of Cumberland shall submit to the Authority for review and approval any plan for any activity the City proposes to conduct, assist, license, or permit that will affect property within the park corridor:
After the Authority's adoption of a management plan for the Heritage Area in accordance with this subtitle; and
Before the City implements its plan for the activity.
